sentences.english: One flat can accommodate a family of five.
sentences.chinese: 一套房間可供五口之家居住。

sentences.english: Huizhou located at Xizhi Jiang nearby, the fine scenery, suits the housing.
sentences.chinese: 惠州位於西枝江旁，風景優美，適合居住。

sentences.english: "Yinziwu" is warm in winter and cool in summer, making it a good place for living.
sentences.chinese: 洪江古商城的窨子屋冬暖夏涼，十分適宜居住。

sentences.english: Like living in the mountains from the solitary who had every day.
sentences.chinese: 像躲避在深山老林居住的獨行者過每天。

sentences.english: It is legal to stay in China only after you have the valid Residence Permit.
sentences.chinese: 留學生持居留許可在華居住方屬合法。

sentences.english: Because different worms live in different strata, or portions of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 不同的蚯蚓居住在不同的土壤層。

sentences.english: The leaders of the city always boast that the city is the most suitable place for human beings to live.
sentences.chinese: 海口市當局總是吹噓這個城市最適合人類居住。

sentences.english: Who lived in the land in the time of Moses?
sentences.chinese: 那片土地在摩西時代居住的是什麼人？

sentences.english: Captain Harville had taken his present house for half a year;
sentences.chinese: 哈維爾上校租下現在這幢房子，打算居住半年。

sentences.english: The habitability of Earth depends on a lot more than just orbit location and its mass.
sentences.chinese: 地球的可居住性不僅僅取決於它的位置和雲層。

sentences.english: Sunshine Town is a great place to live and you will love it here.
sentences.chinese: 陽光城是一個居住的好地方，你在這裏一定會喜歡它。

sentences.english: Individual families should be responsible for the cleanliness of their own units.
sentences.chinese: 每個家庭都有義務清潔他們自己的居住單元。

sentences.english: Image CreditWhen reduced to begging in enclaves of humanity, the birds can often lose some of the wildness.
sentences.chinese: 在人類居住地乞食的鶴鴕漸漸的就會失去野性。

sentences.english: Songshan is one of the first-inhabited area of Chinese ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 嵩山是中國祖先最早居住的地區之一。

sentences.english: The family that sold it to Mr. Gittes had turned it into a warren of apartments for various relatives.
sentences.chinese: 賣給吉茨的這家人把它變成了衆多親屬居住的大雜院。

sentences.english: Drafty a standard that is quality of evaluation living space.
sentences.chinese: 通風良好是評價居住空間質量的一個標準。
